graph.name: Database size - Ammount of messages in database
High process memory | 0 = Normal, 1 = Process memory exceedss threshold
High system memory | 0 = Normal, 1 = System memory exceedss threshold
High thread count | 0 = Normal, 1 = Thread Count exceedss threshold
In-process message count - Number of in-memory messages delivered
Message delivery incoming rate - Number of messages per second
Message delivery outgoing rate - Number of messages per second
